successes.title: CruxSKUNK™ - Powerful iPad® Laptop
successes.description: The CruxSKUNK™ Turns your iPad® into a powerful laptop — SKUNKS ALL OTHER KEYBOARDS!

Pledges.description: INNOVATOR SPECIAL: As a thank you for being one of the very first to support the CruxSKUNK™, you will receive a CruxSKUNK™ and leather sleeve for $135. You're essentially getting the CruxSKUNK™ and sleeve at cost. [Please add $10 for shipping. Please add $55 for international shipping. Please add $40 for shipping to Canada.]

NEW! ACCELERATOR SPECIAL: As a thank you for helping us keep the funding momentum. You will receive a CruxSKUNK™ and leather sleeve for $155. You're essentially getting the CruxSKUNK™ and sleeve very close to cost. [Please add $10 for shipping. Please add $55 for international shipping. Please add $40 for shipping to Canada.]

EARLY ADOPTER SPECIAL: As a thank you for being one of the first to support the CruxSKUNK™, you will receive a CruxSKUNK™ and leather sleeve for $175. [Please add $10 for shipping. Please add $55 for international shipping. Please add $40 for shipping to Canada.]

LIMITED EDITION SPECIAL: For this pledge you will receive one of the first CruxSKUNKS™ and leather sleeves, laser engraved with the Kickstarter logo and your order number. Your number will match the order in which pledged. Example: The first backer will receive model #1, etc... [Please add $10 for shipping. Please add $55 for international shipping. Please add $40 for shipping to Canada.]

DOUBLE-UP SAVER SPECIAL: As a thank you for backing the CruxSKUNK™, you will receive 2 CruxSKUNKS™ and 2 leather sleeves for $310. [Please add $15 for shipping. Please add $65 for international shipping. Please add $50 for shipping to Canada.]

HIGH FIVE SPECIAL: As a thank you for backing the CruxSKUNK™, you will receive 5 CruxSKUNKS™ and 5 leather sleeves for $765. [Please add $65 for shipping. Please add $150 for international shipping. Please add $125 for shipping to Canada.]

BIG TEN SPECIAL: As a thank you for backing the CruxSKUNK™, you will receive 10 CruxSKUNKS™ and 10 leather sleeves for $1500. [Please add $100 for shipping. Please add $200 for international shipping. Please add $150 for shipping to Canada.]
